name: Cicada Defense Force
description:
Created for IGDA DC's June Jam 2021.

Cut through the swarm of cicadas and thin out their overwhelming number a little.

Use mouse to move, and left mouse button to fire.

Be careful not to get too close to any cicadas or they might get sucked into the engine and cause it to explode.

  • Created in Unity
  • Fonts from DaFont
  • Music & background sounds from FreeSound
  • Sound effects from Kenney
  • Tilemap textures from Kenney
  • Everything else created by Taranis Elsu
